data.text: Racism, xenophobia and intolerance exist everywhere. But every day, each & every one of us can #FightRacism. Here's how: https://t.co/SWzARZPfow https://t.co/6LDOVcBNkt

In Mali, @antonioguterres awarded medals to UN Peacekeepers from Bangladesh & Nigeria #ServingForPeace with @UN_MINUSMA.

Over 1600 medical workers have been killed in conflicts since 2014. 
They save lives on the frontlines and must be protected. https://t.co/fubc7cSead #NotATarget https://t.co/tiL2q0xoT2

Enrolment in primary education in developing countries has reached 91% but 57M children remain out of school. The #GlobalGoals aim to achieve quality education for all: https://t.co/4LPaezguyW https://t.co/CQTWXdrV6d

More than $1.7 trillion dollars was spent last year on arms and armies. That is around 80 times the amount needed to meet the humanitarian aid needs of the whole world. 

This week @AntonioGuterres unveiled a new disarmament agenda. https://t.co/0DLs46ABxo

Every year, @WHO recognizes major achievements in public health. Read the stories of this year's awardees who changed the lives of many people from India to Costa Rica: https://t.co/SQUWuOMXLy https://t.co/xuVoefiV4p
